bibl.title: A Byzantine Gold-Mining Town in the Eastern Desert of Egypt: Bir Umm Fawakhir, 1992-93.
bibl.note: Previous accounts and historical studies. - Bir Umm Fawakhir and the Byzantine gold problem. - The geology of the Bir Umm Fawakhir area. - Pre-Byzantine remains at Bir Umm Fawakhir. - The Byzantine town. - Population size of Bir Umm Fawakhir. - Peripheral structures and ruins. - Inscribed amphorae. - The pottery. - Artifacts. - Conclusions.
MEYER Carol, A Byzantine Gold-Mining Town in the Eastern Desert of Egypt: Bir Umm Fawakhir, 1992-93.
JRA 8 (1995) pp. 192-224, 16 figg. et 2 pll. coul.
